column4: Fontaine Rd will be intermittently closed between High St and Desha Rd during the day while High St is being paved.
Traffic will detour to Desha -> Ghent -> Hanover -> High St, and vice-versa only while High St is being paved.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
column4: The bridge is closed until further notice due to fire damage from a previous collision.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
column4: Details, detours, and updates from the KY Transportation Cabinet.
